sentence.idiomatic: Over the summer holidays he went to the countryside and experienced first-hand the hard work of the peasants.
This is the first time I have experienced such a lively spectacle first-hand.
I have never personally put it into practice--how could I know its benefits?
Remembering the love her parents had for her, she suddenly had the impulse to cry.
I'm sorry, I'm too impulsive. I shouldn't have said those kinds of things to you.
Don't get overly excited. At a critical moment like this you need to be a little more calm.
You hurt her so deeply. Perhaps she will never forgive you.
It's all my fault for being too impulsive. I shouldn't have hit you--please forgive me.
If I don't get your forgiveness, I won't leave.
He took so many medications, but his health is just the same as before; it hasn't gotten any better.
Everything is always the same, so ordinary. It's really dull.
Their relationship is still the same as always. When they meet they don't say a word to each other.
Don't be so pessimistic--later things will get better.
When she just got divorced, she was especially pessimistic. She felt that life had no hope.
He has always been such an optimistic young fellow, how come he suddenly became so pessimistic?

word.literal: destined to meet but not meant to be

sentence.idiomatic: Although they really love each other, it's just too bad that they were destined to meet but not meant to be. In the end, because of their parent's opposition, they broke up.

word.literal: destined to meet but not meant to be

sentence.idiomatic: Perhaps we really were just destined to meet but not destined to be together. We met, but could not be together.

word.literal: destined to meet but not meant to be

sentence.idiomatic: We were about to get together, then this thing happened. It looks like we were destined to meet but not destined to be together.
You aren't a mother. You have no way to understand a mother's pain.
Having undergone this, I finally realize the bad results of not being informed.
The common people truly know the benefits that economic development brings to life.
Although I didn't get the prize, I won everyone's approval and am content.
People need to understand contentment. This is the only way to be happy.
You have such a happy family, how can you still be discontent?
When he was three years old he immigrated to Canada with his parents.
The reason he was refused a visa was because he may be inclined to immigrate.
Is it difficult to emigrate from China to the United States?
